snippet.title: Dark and Light First Teaser
snippet.description:
Website:                http://www.playdnl.com/
Facebook:             https://www.facebook.com/officialDNL/
Twitter:                  https://twitter.com/official_DNL
Instagram:            https://www.instagram.com/darkandlightofficial/
Reddit:                   https://www.reddit.com/r/dnl/

About Dark and Light
Dark and Light is a new PC sandbox fantasy RPG from Snail Games, an open-world survival adventure that sets players loose on an untamed planet. Utilizing the UE4 graphics engine, a highly realistic natural environment has been created, featuring all kinds of plants, fantastic creatures, and brutal weather conditions.
